actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for additional compensation for any veterans who have suffered loss or loss of use of one lung or one kidney.

summary.text: Entitles to additional service-connected disability compensation any veteran who has suffered loss or loss of use of one lung or one kidney. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 314(k)).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for additional compensation for any veterans who have suffered loss or loss of use of one lung or one kidney.
